title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2250/85 of 2 August 1985 fixing, for 1985/86 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2250/85
of 2 August 1985
fixing, for 1985/86 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at 307,23 ECU per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 August 1985.
For the Commission
The President
Jacques DELORS
